name: No More Ants - squash them all
name_original: No More Ants - squash them all
description:
Ants, ants, ants... ants everywhere ...

To beat the highscore you have to kill as many ants as possible by squashing them with your fingers before the timer runs out. How many can you squash?

FEATURES:
- Leaderboard
- Various achievements
- Many blood and splatter effects
- 2 game-modes (time trial and splatter mania)
- fun ;-)

Get it now! You won’t regret it!
